hero.title: Explore our collection
shop.title: Shop your style
shop.text: Safary is a young brand of women's clothing that falls in love with itself at first sight with the purity of forms, natural colors and flying fabrics. This is a subtle combination of sporty style and femininity, especially valuable in a big city, where both style and comfort are important at the same time.The store offers basic skirts, dresses and outerwear.You look â€” and you want to wear each of the things without taking them off!
